name: Magic Roulette
description:
This is similar to magic 8 ball,  just click on the spin button for the result. This game should be played with your social bubble.

There are 4 types of modes in Settings Page

Points:  playing for points with social bubble

What to eat: when you are having hard time deciding what to eat.

Ask me: similar  to Magic 8 Ball

Custom: You can edit the spaces

Stay Safe!!
